sc.server

Class Lobby

  • java.lang.Object
    • sc.server.Lobby
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClientListener

    public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
implements IClientListener
    The lobby will help clients find a open game or create new games to play with another client.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the ClientManager in it's own daemon thread. This method should be used only once. ClientManager starts clientListener. clientListener starts SocketListener on defined port to watch for new connecting clients.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • onClientConnected

        public void onClientConnected(Client client)
        Add lobby as listener to client. Prepare client for send and receive.
        Parameters:
        client - connected XStreamClient
